channel.title: Procedure MultiText(Text: TStringArray);

item.title: Procedure MultiText(Text: TStringArray);
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

procedure MultiText(Text: TStringArray); var i, a: Integer; begin for i:=0 to High(Text) do begin TypeSend(Text[i]); repeat a:=a+1; Wait(30+Random(51)); Until(a>5); end; end;

Simple code, yet some may find it useful. The usage is: MultiText(['Text here', 'Text here']);
Of course, you can have as many sentences and you would like.

Here is a test file:[code=geshi]
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
procedure MultiText(Text: TStringArray);
var
i, a: Integer;
begin
for i:=0 to High(Text) do
begin
TypeSend(Text[i]);
repeat
a:=a+1;
Wait(30+Random(51));
Until(a>5);
end;
end;

begin
MultiText([‘Hello’, ‘what the’, ‘hi’, ‘this is multi-text’, ‘by IP-Drowner’]);
end.[/code]

Enjoy
